long_description: The REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capri pants) combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of workout capris. Both skirt and capris are made of 4-way stretch polyester/spandex that provides comfort as you move. Built-in capris provide lightweight warmth to keep you comfortable in cool conditions; mesh panels behind knees vent excess heat as you work out. Mesh panel along back yoke offers added ventilation; it also wicks moisture and dries quickly. Skirt fabric has a UPF 50+ sun protection rating. Elastic waistband with drawcord provides a comfortable fit. Zippered lumbar pocket features a sweat-resistant skin-side lining to keep cash, a key and a credit card dry. Capri pants have a 14.5 in. inseam. The REI Fleet Skapris have an active fit that offers a full range of motion.
short_description: The REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capri pants) combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of workout capris.
